meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively sweet.
meanings.sent1: The oversweetness of the cake made it difficult to eat.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't handle the oversweetness of the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The oversweetness of the lemonade made everyone pucker their lips.
meanings.sent4: The oversweetness of her smile was like a sugary embrace.
meanings.sent5: The oversweetness of the candy was overwhelming, like a sugar avalanche.

meanings.sent1: The oversweetness of the syrup masked the flavor of the pancakes.
meanings.sent2: She cringed at the oversweetness of the soda.
meanings.sent3: The oversweetness of the love letter made her roll her eyes.
meanings.sent4: The oversweetness of the moment lingered in the air like a saccharine fog.
meanings.sent5: The oversweetness of the perfume was cloying, like drowning in a vat of sugar.
